name: PHARMERICA CORPORATION, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES, EX REL. Marc SILVER
name_abbreviation: Pharmerica Corp. v. United States ex rel. Silver

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
PHARMERICA CORPORATION, Petitioner
v.
UNITED STATES, EX REL. Marc SILVER
attorneys: Motion of Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
PHARMERICA CORPORATION, Petitioner
v.
UNITED STATES, EX REL. Marc SILVER
No. 18-1044
Supreme Court of the United States.
October 7, 2019
Motion of Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
